archimate:BusinessObject.name: RDB2RDF R2RML
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: https://www.w3.org/2001/sw/wiki/R2RML R2RML is a language for expressing customized mappings from relational databases to RDF datasets. It is one of the two technologies developed as part of the RDB2RDF work; see the specification for further details. https://www.w3.org/TR/r2rml/
